Post.title: (How to Use the Code Coverage Analysis Tool)
Post._content:
> CICode Coverage

**Code Coverage**CIVS ultimateCode Coverage

## Code Coverage
![](https://github.com/xiong-ang/xiong-ang.github.io/blob/Hexo/MyBlog/MyBlog/images/codecoverage.PNG?raw=true)

1. InstrumentVsinstr.exePDB
2. Vsperfcmd.exeVsperfmon.exe,InstrumentedVsperfmon.exe
3. 
4. VsperfcmdCode Coverage

## Workflow
1. Code Coverage
2. PDBCode CoveragePDB
3. 

>* Instrumt 
```
Vsinstr -coverage <myprojectbinary  the dll/exe>
...
Vsinstr -coverage <myprojectbinary the dll/exe>
```

>* 
```
VSPerfCmd.exe /start:coverage /output:"*.Coverage"

Start vsperfmon -coverage -output:mytestrun.coverage
```

>* 
```
vsperfcmd shutdown
```

4. Instrumt,
5. 
6. 

## 
1. Code CoverageVSPerfMon.exedCode Coverage
2. *.coverageInstrumentedPDBVSXML
3. Instrument
4. BlockCode CoverageBlockInstrumented CILCodeCodeVSCode Coverage
5. Last but not least, : [https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd299398(v=vs.90).aspx]

> --Barret Xiong--
>

Post.title: C#(Exception Process in C#)
Post.content:
1. new Exception()>
  2. Exception.MessageException.ToString()>Exception.ToString()
  3. catch>
  4. using>using
  6. catchcall stack>throw; 

public class SQLException : Exception
{
    public SQLException(string message) : base(message)
    {
    }
}


static void InitUnhandledException()
{
    AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException += CurrentDomain_UnhandledException;
}
static void CurrentDomain_UnhandledException(object sender, UnhandledExceptionEventArgs unhandledExceptionEventArgs)
{
    var exception = unhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExceptionObject as Exception;
    //Log
}

BUGUnhandledExceptionCurrentDomain_UnhandledExceptionUnhandledExceptionCurrentDomain_UnhandledExceptionConsole

CrashReporter.NET
Post.more:
1. new Exception()>
  2. Exception.MessageException.ToString()>Exception.ToString()
  3. catch>
  4. using>using
  6. catchcall stack>throw; 

public class SQLException : Exception
{
    public SQLException(string message) : base(message)
    {
    }
}


static void InitUnhandledException()
{
    AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException += CurrentDomain_UnhandledException;
}
static void CurrentDomain_UnhandledException(object sender, UnhandledExceptionEventArgs unhandledExceptionEventArgs)
{
    var exception = unhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExceptionObject as Exception;
    //Log
}

Post.title: LinuxBase
Post._content:
# Linux                    
1. /          
2. linux4M        
#             
1. : shutdown -h now         
2. : shutdown -r now         
3. : reboot                  
4. : startx           
5. : logout              
6. : su                  
7. : sudo        
8. : ls/ls -la           
9. : pwd             
10. : mkdir             
11. : rmdir             
12. : rm                
13. : touch           
14. : cp                    
15. : mv                
16. : rm -rf        
17. : ln            
18. : more/less     
19. : grep              
20. : |                            
21. : find                
22. : >>><          
23. : cat
# vi                              
1. : vi            
2. :1.Comandmode-->2.Insertmode-->;3.Lastline mode-->[](https://www.cnblogs.com/jiayongji/p/5771444.html)                      
# Linux                    
1. :                    
2.                               
![](https://github.com/xiong-ang/xiong-ang.github.io/blob/Hexo/MyBlog/MyBlog/images/FileSystem.png?raw=true)                      
3. root:root               
4. home:               
5. bin:                    
6. sbin:           
7. mnt:              
8. usr:                  
9. boot:                   
10. etc:                   
11. var:                   
# Linux                     
1. : useradd                   
2. : passwd                    
3. : userdel                   
4. : userdel -r        
# Linux                
1. Linux                    
2. : groupadd                            
3. : /etc/group                      
4. : useradd -g           
5. : /etc/passwd                   
6. d|rwx|rwx|rwx:1.-/d/l2.4/2/13.4.                     
7. : chmod,chmod 777           
8. root: usermod -g          
9. : chown             
10. : chgrp              
# Linux                  
1. :0-->1-->2-->3-->4-->5-->6-->/etc/inittab - id:5:initdefault:grubeegrub1                      
2. /: 1.: mount /mnt/cdrom/;2.: umount /mnt/cdrom;            
3. Linuxx:./               
4. : tar -zxvf *.tar.gz             
5. : 1.2.43.WindowsLinux4.Linuxfdisk -l5.: df 6.: df -h                        
5. Linux: 1./boot 100Mswap 256M/ 2.swap                                
6. Linux Shell:1.shell:env;2.shell:chsh -s shell/bin/csh

# ****
1. **AllowDrop**  
AllowDropTrue
2. **DragDrop**    

```  
private void listBox1_MouseDown(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e)
{
    this.listBox1.DoDragDrop("Drag Data", DragDropEffects.Move);
}
```    

3. **DragDrop**   

```    
private void listBox2_DragEnter(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs e)
{
    if (e.Data.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.Text))
    {
        //DragDrop
        e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Move;
    }
}

private void listBox2_DragDrop(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs e)
{
    //DragDrop
    this.listBox2.Items.Add(e.Data.GetData(DataFormats.Text));
    this.listBox1.Items.Remove(e.Data.GetData(DataFormats.Text));
}
```      

# ****    


Post.title: C# ClipboardHow to Use Clipboard in C#
Post.content:
Clipboard

ClipboardCtrlCCtrlVCtrlVCtrlVVisual C
ClipboardMSDN 

/*
Clipboard
Winfrmbutton1, button2, textBox1, textBox2
*/

private void button1_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
    //button1_Click SetDataObjecttextBox1

    if(textBox1.SelectedText != "")
       Clipboard.SetDataObject(textBox1.SelectedText);
    else
       textBox2.Text = "No text selected in textBox1";
 }

 private void button2_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
    //button2_Click GetDataObject

    IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();

    //Text
    if(iData.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.Text)) {
       textBox2.Text = (String)iData.GetData(DataFormats.Text); 
    }
    else {
       textBox2.Text = "Could not retrieve data off the clipboard.";
    }
 }

ClipboardSetDataObjecGetDataObject

Clipboard/

Clipboard

  • Clipboard 
class ClipboardDataFormat
{
    public static readonly string TEXT="Text";
    public static readonly string IMAGE="Image";
    public static readonly string FILEDROP="FileDrop";
    public static readonly string AUDIO="Audio";
    public static readonly string USERDEFINED="UserDefined";
}

class ClipboardProcesser
{
    public static void SetDataToClipboard(object o, string type)
    {
        try
        {
            if (o != null)
            {
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetText((string)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetFileDropList((System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetImage((System.Drawing.Image)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetAudio((Stream)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED)
                {
                    MyItem item = (MyItem)o;
                    item.ToClipboard();
                }
            }
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
        }
    }

//
[Serializable]
public class MyItem
{
    public string ItemName { get; set; }
    public object ItemData { get; set; }

    public void ToClipboard()
    {
        DataFormats.Format format = DataFormats.GetFormat(ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED);

        IDataObject dataObj = new DataObject();
        dataObj.SetData(format.Name, false, this);
        Clipboard.SetDataObject(dataObj, false);
    }
}
  • Clipboard 
public static object GetDataFromClipboardByType(string type)
    {
        object retObj = null;
        try
        {
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetText();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetFileDropList();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetImage();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetAudioStream();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED)
            {
                IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
                retObj = (MyItem)iData.GetData(type);
            }                
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
            retObj = null;
        }
        return retObj;
    }

    public static string GetDataTypeFromClipboard()
    {
        string type = string.Empty;

        try
        {
            if (Clipboard.ContainsText())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsImage())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsAudio())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO;
            }
            else
            {
                IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
                if (iData.GetDataPresent(ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED))
                {
                    type = ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED;
                } 
            }
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
        }
        return type;
    }
}

Clipboard

Clipboard

  • Form 
// SetClipboardViewer 
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("user32")]
private static extern IntPtr SetClipboardViewer(IntPtr hwnd);

//ChangeClipboardChainhwndhWndNext
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("user32")]
private static extern IntPtr ChangeClipboardChain(IntPtr hwnd,IntPtr hWndNext);

//SendMessage 
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("user32")]
private static extern int SendMessage(IntPtr hwnd,int wMsg,IntPtr wParam,IntPtr lParam);

//Clipboard
const int WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD = 0x308;
//Clipboard
const int WM_CHANGECBCHAIN = 0x30D;
  • Form_Load 
//   
IntPtr NextClipHwnd;
private void Form_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{  
     //
    NextClipHwnd=SetClipboardViewer(this.Handle);           
}
  • WndProc 
protected override void WndProc(ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m)
{
    switch(m.Msg)
    {
        case WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD:
            //WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD
            SendMessage(NextClipHwnd,m.Msg,m.WParam,m.LParam);

            //Clipboard
            IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
            ...
            ...
            break;
        default:
            base.WndProc(ref m);
            break;
    }       
}
  • Form_Closed 
private void Form_Closed(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
    //
    ChangeClipboardChain(this.Handle,NextClipHwnd);
    //WM_CHANGECBCHAIN
    SendMessage(NextClipHwnd,WM_CHANGECBCHAIN,this.Handle,NextClipHwnd);  
}

private void button1_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
    //button1_Click SetDataObjecttextBox1

    if(textBox1.SelectedText != "")
       Clipboard.SetDataObject(textBox1.SelectedText);
    else
       textBox2.Text = "No text selected in textBox1";
 }

 private void button2_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
    //button2_Click GetDataObject

    IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();

    //Text
    if(iData.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.Text)) {
       textBox2.Text = (String)iData.GetData(DataFormats.Text); 
    }
    else {
       textBox2.Text = "Could not retrieve data off the clipboard.";
    }
 }

  • Clipboard 
class ClipboardDataFormat
{
    public static readonly string TEXT="Text";
    public static readonly string IMAGE="Image";
    public static readonly string FILEDROP="FileDrop";
    public static readonly string AUDIO="Audio";
    public static readonly string USERDEFINED="UserDefined";
}

class ClipboardProcesser
{
    public static void SetDataToClipboard(object o, string type)
    {
        try
        {
            if (o != null)
            {
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetText((string)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetFileDropList((System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetImage((System.Drawing.Image)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO)
                {
                    Clipboard.SetAudio((Stream)o);
                }
                if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED)
                {
                    MyItem item = (MyItem)o;
                    item.ToClipboard();
                }
            }
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
        }
    }

//
[Serializable]
public class MyItem
{
    public string ItemName { get; set; }
    public object ItemData { get; set; }

    public void ToClipboard()
    {
        DataFormats.Format format = DataFormats.GetFormat(ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED);

        IDataObject dataObj = new DataObject();
        dataObj.SetData(format.Name, false, this);
        Clipboard.SetDataObject(dataObj, false);
    }
}
  • Clipboard 
public static object GetDataFromClipboardByType(string type)
    {
        object retObj = null;
        try
        {
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetText();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetFileDropList();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetImage();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO)
            {
                retObj = Clipboard.GetAudioStream();
            }
            if (type == ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED)
            {
                IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
                retObj = (MyItem)iData.GetData(type);
            }                
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
            retObj = null;
        }
        return retObj;
    }

    public static string GetDataTypeFromClipboard()
    {
        string type = string.Empty;

        try
        {
            if (Clipboard.ContainsText())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.TEXT;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.FILEDROP;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsImage())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.IMAGE;
            }
            else if (Clipboard.ContainsAudio())
            {
                type = ClipboardDataFormat.AUDIO;
            }
            else
            {
                IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
                if (iData.GetDataPresent(ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED))
                {
                    type = ClipboardDataFormat.USERDEFINED;
                } 
            }
        }
        catch (Exception)
        {
        }
        return type;
    }
}

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("user32")]
private static extern IntPtr SetClipboardViewer(IntPtr hwnd);

//ChangeClipboardChainhwndhWndNext

private static extern IntPtr ChangeClipboardChain(IntPtr hwnd,IntPtr hWndNext);

//SendMessage

private static extern int SendMessage(IntPtr hwnd,int wMsg,IntPtr wParam,IntPtr lParam);

  • WndProc 
protected override void WndProc(ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m)
{
    switch(m.Msg)
    {
        case WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD:
            //WM_DRAWCLIPBOARD
            SendMessage(NextClipHwnd,m.Msg,m.WParam,m.LParam);

            //Clipboard
            IDataObject iData = Clipboard.GetDataObject();
            ...
            ...
            break;
        default:
            base.WndProc(ref m);
            break;
    }       
}
  • Form_Closed 
private void Form_Closed(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
    //
    ChangeClipboardChain(this.Handle,NextClipHwnd);
    //WM_CHANGECBCHAIN
    SendMessage(NextClipHwnd,WM_CHANGECBCHAIN,this.Handle,NextClipHwnd);  
}
